arts.ttl: In-form Wolfsburg dominant in win vs Hoffenheim
arts.sum: Hoffenheim were overran by an in-form Wolfsburg side as they lost 3-0 in the third round of the DFB-Pokal on Wednesday.

arts.ttl: Why Borussia Dortmund will likely not sign Hoffenheim’s Tom Bischof
arts.sum: Sport Bild reports that despite interest in the midfielder, Borussia Dortmund are unlikely to try and sign Hoffenheim’s Tom Bischof. Right now, Bischof is probably the most sort after talent in…

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich leading race for Hoffenheim’s Tom Bischof
arts.sum: Sport Bild report that Bayern Munich are leading RB Leipzig, Eintracht Frankfurt and VfB Stuttgart in the race to sign Hoffenheim talent Tom Bischof (19). The German youth international is…

arts.ttl: Report: Bayern emerge as frontrunners for Bischof, Hoffenheim exit very likely
arts.sum: According to Sport Bild, Bayern Munich are leading the race to sign Tim Bischof, who is unlikely to renew his expiring contract.

arts.ttl: Wolfsburg vs. Hoffenheim preview: Team news and predicted lineups
arts.sum: Wolfsburg host Hoffenheim at the Volkswagen Arena in the third round of the DFB-Pokal in a bid to repeat the glory of their 2015 trophy victory.

arts.ttl: Wolfsburg duo to leave in January?
arts.sum: Ridle Baku and Jonas Wind could reportedly both leave VfL Wolfsburg during the winter transfer window.

arts.ttl: Preview: Wolfsburg vs. Hoffenheim - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Wednesday's DFB-Pokal clash between Wolfsburg and Hoffenheim, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
